Plot: British retirees travel to India to take up residence in what they believe is a newly restored hotel. Less luxurious than advertised, the Marigold Hotel nevertheless slowly begins to charm in unexpected ways.
Title: The Best Exotic Marigold Hotel
Awards: Nominated for 2 Golden Globes. Another 4 wins & 20 nominations.
Actors: Judi Dench, Tom Wilkinson, Patrick Pearson, Hugh Dickson
